医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
传统的超自然现象信仰与压力增加和应对能力减少有关在一项新的研究中，痛苦的感觉和应对压力的能力下降与传统的超自然信仰有关，但与新时代哲学无关。 - https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Traditional-paranormal-beliefs-linked-to-increased-stress-and-reduced-coping.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Traditional-paranormal-beliefs-linked-to-increased-stress-and-reduced-coping.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=21e83c68-be45-426c-9a9d-c14a0cee048b Thu, 14 Nov 2024 02:13:13 -0500 Traditional paranormal beliefs linked to increased stress and reduced coping
MRI 引导的 SBRT 可减少前列腺癌治疗的副作用经过两年的全面随访，加州大学洛杉矶分校健康琼森综合癌症中心的研究人员发现，针对前列腺癌的 MRI 引导立体定向放射治疗 (SBRT) 显着减少了长期副作用并提高了生活质量，特别是在肠道和癌症方面。与传统 CT 引导治疗相比，性健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/MRI-guided-SBRT-reduces-side-effects-in-prostate-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/MRI-guided-SBRT-reduces-side-effects-in-prostate-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1785984e-afb0-4353-a927-ddca138af9c4 Thu, 14 Nov 2024 01:46:18 -0500 MRI-guided SBRT reduces side effects in prostate cancer treatment
科学家发现睾丸癌背后的关键遗传因素科学家们发现了导致睾丸癌的新基因缺陷和进化模式。他们的研究结果为该疾病的发展和潜在的治疗策略提供了深刻的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Scientists-discover-key-genic-factors-behind-testular-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Scientists-discover-key-genic-factors-behind-testular-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8137e30f-d8ff-415e-9ff8-471fa896e2dc Thu, 14 Nov 2024 01:27:22 -0500 Scientists discover key genetic factors behind testicular cancer
研究表明微生物负荷如何影响肠道健康和疾病无论疾病还是健康，栖息在我们肠道内的数十亿微生物都是我们一生不变的伴侣。在过去的几十年里，科学家们已经证明了这种“微生物组”的性质如何为人类疾病及其治疗提供有价值的线索。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Study-shows-how-microbial-load-affects-gut-health-and-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Study-shows-how-microbial-load-affects-gut-health-and-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8f72e610-c5ab-4ca1-bf05-4a81da73e888 Thu, 14 Nov 2024 00:30:41 -0500 Study shows how microbial load affects gut health and disease
Chat GPT Plus 在诊断患者方面并不优于传统方法由于医院已经部署人工智能来改善患者护理，一项新研究发现，与使用常规资源相比，使用 Chat GPT Plus 并不能显着提高医生诊断的准确性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Chat-GPT-Plus-doesne28099t-outperform-conventional-methods-in-diagnosing-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Chat-GPT-Plus-doesne28099t-outperform-conventional-methods-in-diagnosing-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1822004a-1331-444e-aacf-529ceba4f58c Thu, 14 Nov 2024 00:20:00 -0500 Chat GPT Plus doesn’t outperform conventional methods in diagnosing patients
初级保健临床医生是实现最佳心血管健康的关键初级保健临床医生和实践具有独特的优势，可以通过筛查、诊断和治疗美国心脏协会生命基本 8 项健康指标中概述的健康行为和因素，帮助人们实现最佳心血管健康，从而降低心脏病和中风的风险。新的科学声明今天发表在该协会的同行评审期刊《循环：心血管质量和结果》上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241113/Primary-care-clinicians-key-to-achiving-optimal-cardioangio-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241113/Primary-care-clinicians-key-to-achiving-optimal-cardioangio-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=87c9f269-01ac-43be-acca-fa8b51e72aa9 Wed, 13 Nov 2024 23:57:55 -0500 Primary care clinicians key to achieving optimal cardiovascular health
UAB研究人员通过基因疗法逆转小鼠肝病阿拉巴马大学研究人员在小鼠模型中逆转了代谢功能障碍相关的脂肪性肝炎（MASH）。 MASH 是一种与肥胖和 2 型糖尿病相关的严重肝脏疾病，影响超过 4000 万人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241113/UAB-researchers-reverse-liver-disease-in-mice-with-gene-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241113/UAB-researchers-reverse-liver-disease-in-mice-with-gene-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f8286ebd-998d-4107-9142-87bcf06c83f9 Wed, 13 Nov 2024 23:51:00 -0500 UAB researchers reverse liver disease in mice with gene therapy
研究发现耐药结核病病原体的弱点奥塔哥大学领导的一项研究发现了耐药结核分枝杆菌的高度脆弱性，从而提供了一种杀死它们的新方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241113/Study-finds-weakness-in-drug-pressive-tuberculosis-pathogens.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241113/Study-finds-weakness-in-drug-pressive-tuberculosis-pathogens.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=00cf0907-8be7-4223-9a11-3b833c63041f Wed, 13 Nov 2024 23:47:02 -0500 Study finds weakness in drug-resistant tuberculosis pathogens
歌手艾米·格兰特强调需要支持来对抗女性心脏病创作型歌手兼音乐家艾米·格兰特 (Amy Grant) 亲身体会到心血管疾病 (CVD) 仍然是女性的第一大死因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241113/Singer-Amy-Grant-highlights-the-need-for-support-to-fight-womens-heart-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241113/Singer-Amy-Grant-highlights-the-need-for-support-to-fight-womens-heart-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8d45eff0-1091-4af9-9f31-d5a500ade78b Wed, 13 Nov 2024 23:39:57 -0500 Singer Amy Grant highlights the need for support to fight women's heart disease
罗格斯大学的研究揭示了贝达喹啉如何对抗耐药结核病罗格斯大学健康中心的研究揭示了为什么一种相对较新的结核病抗生素能够对抗多重耐药菌株，这可能会激发改进的治疗方法和药物开发策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241113/Rutgers-study-sheds-light-on-how-bedaquiline-fights-drug-pressive-tuberculosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241113/Rutgers-study-sheds-light-on-how-bedaquiline-fights-drug-pressive-tuberculosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bab2a2e2-066b-4e23-83f3-0df3dbf92f9e Wed, 13 Nov 2024 23:22:28 -0500 Rutgers study sheds light on how bedaquiline fights drug-resistant tuberculosis
